# Remediation of BAR-B Beach Refueling Area Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* Reference Number: MX-43052932542
* Solicitation Number: NRE22BB_80875
* Public Publication Date: March 4, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: April 30, 2024 2:00 PM EDT
* Amendment Number: 4
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 30, 2026
* Expected Contract End Date: November 30, 2026

## Procurement Description

The Government of Canada's Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking a qualified contractor to undertake the remediation of the BAR-B Beach Refueling Area at the Stokes Point, Yukon. The scope of work includes, but is not limited to, the removal of contaminated soils associated with hydrocarbons from the former beach refueling area.

## Tender Requirements

* The estimated cost for this opportunity is approximately $25.1 million.
* The work must reach substantial completion by September 15, 2026, and be completed by November 30, 2026.
* This tender is being conducted in accordance with the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA).
* Firms interested in providing these services must submit their abbreviated proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System by the closing date and time indicated on the system.
* Questions regarding this tender must be directed to Justin Bennett at justin.bennett@dcc-cdc.gc.ca or 819-962-2917.
* Bidders can obtain contract award results from the DCC website at https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca/industry/contract-activity.

## Tendered Items

The following tendered items have been included:

* Excavation, containerization, barge, land transport, and disposal of Tier 1 PHC contaminated soil (Code A, Quantity: 5,200 M3)
* Balance of the Contract complete (Code C, Quantity: 1)
* Type 3 Granular Fill to be placed and compacted as backfill (Code B, Quantity: 5,200 M3)
